articles.title: How Long Are Easter Eggs Safe to Eat? - Lifehacker
articles.description: My mother never cared for cheap Easter candy, but she loved to eat the dyed eggs. As a child, this shocked and perplexed me, and not just because I preferred chocolate. It simply did not seem sanitary to me, the child who had found the eggs and picked them up…
